title: I really need a name change.
body: i need a name change im so {{summoner:3}} from trying to find a new name to go by. but i just cant seem to find the right one. can anyone give me some ideas to {{summoner:4}} into?

replies.body: 7DeadLeeSins is the best one

> [{quoted}](name=Fisher No Chains,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QRQGBEjA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-12-09T23:28:01.506+0000)
>
> 7DeadLeeSins is the best one

 omg thats great     (good anime too)
I needa {{champion:64}}  to my heart on this one

What kinds of things do you like? Why did you pick the name you have? What champions do you like? 

A few more details can help us all to suggest a name you'd really like! A lot of these suggestions are super fun already though. :)

Well, it depends on what types of champs  you like to play.

Nauty By Nature

God dman it guy! "NotEVEnclose" is awesome for Eve mains.

Step 1: Think of an adjective

Step 2: Think of a noun that doesn't fit with the adjective you made in step 1

There, you now have a name that is uniquely yours and moderately creative.

Examples:

Verdant Candlestick
Flabbergasted Pickle
Enraged Railing

Just change the first letter of your name to a S

hehehehe
DiscoNunuIsTheBEST

"Eromanga Sensei".

Kekekekekekekekekekekekek

If your first name is chris, then I have a good one, if not stop reading
chris be bakin
say it out loud
I'm obsessed with main names.
Imainyasuo69
Summoner141684189651
Yasuo the Unnerfed and Lamb and the Hound are pretty darn hilarious I must say
